p: A total of 450 COII sequences (518 bp) were obtained from the 463 BMSB individuals (Additional file 1), which formed 29 haplotypes including 20 novel and 9 previously reported (Additional file 2). BLASTn search [ 32] showed that the new haplotypes did not share any identical sequences in the 518 bp overlap COII region with that of the previous reported sequences.
